name: ABBYSON_LIVING_'Marlene'_Brown_Fabric_Futon_Sofa_Bed
reviews: It looks a lot bigger on here. I can sleep one comfortable and 2 very tight. Looks good and feels sturdy and is easy to adjust.
We bought this as we needed a sofa style bed in small space. It is not a sofa, it is a bench. Feels like a board, looks like a board. Very disappointed.

It wasn't at all obvious from the description that this is not a full size sofa bed. I needed something for two adult guest to sleep on and this is not even big enough for one average sized adult. It's also very hard.

The material is very rough and scratchy. The item is much smaller than expected. I was hoping family members could stay the night and feel comfortable on this item, however I am only 5 feet, 7 inches and my feet were hanging off. Very hard and ugly red feet.
description:
Add this comfortable and useful Futon Sofa Bed to your home and you
will appreciate its versatility. Converting from seat to bed
position in seconds, it is ideal for accommodating overnight guests
and maximizing your space. Seat and back cushion made of high density foam, convoluted
  foam, polyesterTufted seating and backIncludes: One (1) futon sofaMaterials: Linen fabric, woodFinish: WalnutUpholstery materials: Linen fabricUpholstery color: BrownSofa dimensions: 30 inches high x 68 inches wide x 32 inches
  deepBed depth: 38 inchesStyleContemporaryMaterialLinenTypeSofaThickness7 InchAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown
